PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-03972015-03-31,  ,  ,  PS, 
ActCorrections and Conditional Release Act
PrecisRe-appointment of HOWARD IAN SAPERS of Ottawa, Ontario, as the Correctional Investigator of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of one year, or until such time as a new Correctional Investigator is appointed, effective April 1, 2015.
AttachmentsAttachment
